about_the_game:
We will all be curious about some experiences. But we also hope that everyone will not encounter such experiences. For example, what does a plane crash look like? This game will let curious you have some VR experiences. Hope there will be no more plane crashes in the real world.
In the game, you will simulate the flight of an airplane and you can control the airplane. After flying for a period of time, the airplane will crash due to a malfunction, and you will also fall to a small island full of zombies due to the crash. In order to survive you need to cut down the zombies and find the treasures on the island.

In order to survive you need to cut down the zombies and find the treasures on the island.
name: VR Plane Crash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2.5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Arabic, Korean
